dict.acceptation: 汤，羹；浓雾；硝化甘油炸药；困境；

sent.orig: Broth: mainly boiled vegetables, such as: cabbage soup, gourd soup, winter melon soup, and so on.
sent.trans: 清汤：以瓜菜为主煮成的，如：白菜汤、丝瓜汤、冬瓜汤等。

sent.orig: Soups tested included separate broth and vegetables, chunky vegetable soup, chunky-pureed vegetable soup vegetable soup.
sent.trans: 测试里包含了经过处理的鸡汁蔬菜汤，大块蔬菜汤，大块蔬菜浓汤，和一般的蔬菜浓汤。

sent.orig: We have sliced chicken soup, sour and hot soup and seafood soup with seasonal vegetable.
sent.trans: 我们有鸡丝汤、酸辣汤和时菜海鲜汤。

sent.orig: What soup do you have? What sort of soup is there?
Because my mother put so much sugar in the soup the soup tasted very sweet.
sent.trans: 因为妈妈放糖太多，这汤喝起来很甜。
